channel.title: How to get better at Java
channel.description: Yeah I was wonder, how could I become a better Java programmer, then I already am. it's like I've been looking around the forums and the things....the servers I've seen people do are like so advanced, too advanced for me at-least, so how could I do better?

item.title: How to get better at Java
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Practice does make perfect. You don’t just look at things and have them come naturally.

What I did was set goals. I started small than worked my way up.
Also, when you have a problem…ask.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get better at Java

item.title: How to get better at Java
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I find learning in school is much better than trying to learn on my own. If they have a computer science course in your school you should take it. They will teach you the basics and it’ll be an easy A.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get better at Java

item.title: How to get better at Java
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

you don’t really need classes to learn basic syntax

Read full topic
item.source: How to get better at Java

item.title: How to get better at Java
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:11, topic:450620”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=553492.msg4056633#msg4056633 date=1343023107]

Think of a project you want to start, and try to employ new things in it.
That is probably the best way to learn.

Watch this guys tutorials… Helped me. ^

Fuck video tutorials, explore the language by yourself.

This. Treat programming like you’re learning a foreign language. You need to learn the basics, then apply the basics to become fluent in speaking it, then you go and learn the different dialects to expand your knowledge of the language.
[/quote]
in theory could you speak java?[/quote]

There isn’t a computer science class at my school, so I was wondering if I could study the language of Java for the class ‘Self-Taught Language’.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get better at Java
